synopsis.text: Chiba Testuya's manga comes to life in this anime, featuring the lively and spirited Akane, a country girl who finds herself in the unfamiliar world of a prestigious school. With her vibrant personality, she quickly captures the hearts of her classmates, including the wealthy and seemingly haughty Hidemaro. As she navigates her new surroundings, Akane faces various challenges, but with the support of her newfound friends, she takes on every hurdle with determination and grace. Watch as Akane's journey unfolds, revealing the true value of friendship and the power of staying true to oneself.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
